name: Clever Leaves Holdings Inc.
description: Clever Leaves Holdings Inc. is a leading global operator and licensed producer of cannabis products, with a focus on sustainability and innovation in the pharmaceutical sector. Founded in 2018, the company is headquartered in Bogotá, Colombia, and has established a strong presence in the international cannabis market, leveraging its strategic cultivation practices in Latin America. Clever Leaves specializes in the production of high-quality, pharmaceutical-grade cannabis extracts, and it holds licenses for cultivation, processing, and exporting cannabis from Colombia to markets around the world. The company's state-of-the-art facilities adhere to rigorous quality standards, ensuring that its products meet the demands of both medical and adult-use consumers. Clever Leaves is committed to environmental sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly farming practices and state-of-the-art technology to minimize its carbon footprint. With a portfolio of diverse cannabis strains and products, including oils, capsules, and dried flowers, Clever Leaves aims to provide accessible and effective cannabis solutions to patients globally. The company is also actively involved in research and development, seeking to expand its product offerings and improve the efficacy of its cannabis-based therapies. Clever Leaves' mission is to lead the way in the cannabis industry by promoting responsible consumption and fostering a greater understanding of the benefits of cannabis.
